plot: A cowboy whose friend has been swindled out of his ranch and then murdered must take care of the man's son, then he goes after the killers.
title: The Montana Kid
plot_es: A cowboy whose friend has been swindled out of his ranch and then murdered must take care of the man's son, then he goes after the killers.
plot_en: A cowboy whose friend has been swindled out of his ranch and then murdered must take care of the man's son, then he goes after the killers.
